Description:
Drop into the action with our Space Marine 2 Siege boost. Hiring a pro player is the fastest way to dominate the brutal Siege mode in Warhammer 40K SM2. With some help from us, you can push for leaderboard spots and get the new rewards during SM Siege carries.
The list of rewards for the Siege mode completion:
Wave 5: 60 requisition (240 on Hard mode)
Wave 10: 3 green Armory Data (purple on Hard mode)
Wave 15: 300 requisition (650 on Hard mode)
Wave 20: 3 purple Armory Data (orange on Hard mode)
Wave 25: 500 requisition (900 on Hard mode)
Additional rewards, such as weapon skins, may drop during the service.

Name: Ordeals Boost
Description:
Buy W40K Space Marine 2 Ordeals boost to get any desired section completed and earn unique cosmetic item rewards quickly, effortlessly, and guaranteed.
If you want to get one of Ordeals' rewards, you've got a lot of grinding to do. Some missions are just time-consuming and boring, while there are also ones that are extremely difficult to do, especially as many times as required.
Luckily, there is an optimal solution to save a lot of time, nerves, and fun while still getting all the desired rewards. Trust this high-quality service by Skycoach and let our PROs ease your life drastically!
With Space Marine 2 Ordeals carry, you will get:
Ordeals of selected selections boosted to the point where you get the research reward;
Option to choose as many Research Data as you need;
Lots of challenging Ordeals missions completed;
Many Ordeals points farmed.
